Name: 祭品的逆襲 The Counterattack Of Sacrifice
About the game: Hello, everyone, this horror game is made using Unity 3D Game Engine / Asset Store, Turbosquid material / mixamo character module / copyright-free tracks. Game Description: Explore the game world through the use of the first person perspective. The scene blends Western and Oriental elements. The content is biased towards horror, darkness, and exotic atmosphere. It also contains some scary scenes,the main mission contains a total of thirteen scenes and three hidden easter egg. The story brief introduction : The parents of the game's storytelling protagonist want to visit relatives living in the distance.Later, because of unknown reasons, there was no news.The protagonist who is determined to go alone in search of the truth,whether protagonist can find parents successfully! ? (More details can be found in the Discussion Area: ;snA=25193&tnum=7 ;snA=5070996&tnum=112 )
